entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023
